plot.content:
@greweb's #10 plot loop. That animation is the main digital art.

A high-quality video will soon be available in 11 NFT editions, one per frame, for buyers to acquire each physical frame. I just don't know yet where I should mint this work that took me a lot of dedication to work and plot for over almost a week now!

I will write more thoughts and making-of in this article soon. In the meantime, I'm sharing a bunch of medias...

Plotting insights

Early proto I had. It was a hard choice to give up on colors and stay on a minimalistic black.

Full picture photos

data.title: circles inside circles inside circles in a circle
